[ComfyUI](https://www.comfy.org/)

ComfyUI is a modular stable diffusion GUI and backend. This ui will let you design and execute advanced stable diffusion pipelines using a graph/nodes/flowchart based interface, checkout the [github here](https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI)
